name: Saturday of Piercing Screams
description:
Become hero of the 1917 revolution in Russia! Pioneers of the Fist occupied the Castle Samozbor. You are the best liquidator Red Army does have.
Crush the members of counter-revolution and escape your doom.

Vanquish your foes with bricks, your own weight or bombs.

Saturday of Piercing Screams features:
+ Legendary cursed infinite-spanning castle
+ 64 levels
+ Destructible environment
+ 914 pioneers
+ Flexing between levels
+ Enduring but simple gameplay
